test_cases.name: create_user
evaluation_criteria: A test that creates a user when name and email are valid
A test that creates a user with optional age omitted
A test that creates a user with age at minimum boundary (0)
A test that creates a user with age at maximum boundary (150)
A test that tries to get the created user by its id and verifies it was created successfully
A test that rejects a request missing required name field
A test that rejects a request missing required email field
A test that rejects a request with empty name value
A test that rejects a request with empty email value
A test that rejects a request with malformed email format (missing @)
A test that rejects a request with age below minimum (negative)
A test that rejects a request with age above maximum (151)
A test that rejects a request with non-integer age value
A test that rejects a request with unexpected additional top-level property
A test that rejects a request using unsupported content type (e.g., text/plain)
A test that rejects a request when required User schema properties are null
A test that validates JSON response matches User schema on success
A test that validates a 400 status code with error message for invalid payload
All users created in the test suite are deleted inside an after or afterEach hook

A test that retrieves users filtered by an exact email address

A test that retrieves users with pageSize set to the minimum allowed value (1)
A test that retrieves users with pageSize set to the maximum allowed value (100)
A test that verifies the response includes total count aligned with returned data
A test that rejects a request with an email filter in an invalid format
A test that rejects a request with page set to zero
A test that rejects a request with page set to a negative number
A test that rejects a request with page set to a non-integer value
A test that rejects a request with pageSize set to zero
A test that rejects a request with pageSize set to a negative number
A test that rejects a request with pageSize greater than the maximum allowed (101)
A test that rejects a request with pageSize set to a non-integer value
A test that rejects a request containing an unexpected additional query parameter
All users created in the test suite (if any) are deleted inside an after or afterEach hook
